R

readFile(String) - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
Opens a file with a specified name for input.
readLineFromServer() - Method in class ss.client.CollectoClient
Reads and returns one line from the server.
readStandardInput() - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
After this method is called, input will be read from standard input (as it is in the default state).
readStream(InputStream) - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
After this method is called, input will be read from inputStream, provided it is non-null.
readStream(Reader) - Static method in class ss.utils.TextIO
After this method is called, input will be read from inputStream, provided it is non-null.
ready(String) - Method in class ss.gamedesign.NetworkGame
Called when a player signifies they are ready to start the game.

RED_BACKGROUND_BRIGHT - Static variable in class ss.gamedesign.ASCIIArtUtils
The background colors of the fields.
removeClient(CollectoClientHandler) - Method in class ss.server.CollectoServer
Removes a clientHandler from the client list.
removeSameBalls() - Method in class ss.gamedesign.Move
Sets all the balls in the fields of the board with neighbours of the same colour to Colour.EMPTY.
reset() - Method in class ss.gamedesign.NetworkGame
Resets the game.
RESET - Static variable in class ss.gamedesign.ASCIIArtUtils

reverseMove() - Method in class ss.gamedesign.Move
Updates all the values of the board to the values of the copy of the original board.
rowCanBeMoved(int) - Method in class ss.gamedesign.Move
Checks if there are empty fields in the row corresponding to row.
run() - Method in class ss.client.CollectoClient
 
run() - Method in class ss.server.CollectoClientHandler
Continuously listens to client input and forwards the input to the CollectoClientHandler.handleCommand(String) method.
run() - Method in class ss.server.CollectoServer
Opens a new socket by calling CollectoServer.setup() and starts a new AbaloneClientHandler for every connecting client.
